client.apis.v1_1_0.notice 源代码

# -*- coding: UTF-8 -*-
"""
@Summary : client notice
@Author  : Rey
@Time    : 2022-04-06 14:07:04
"""
import json

from django.http import JsonResponse
from rest_framework.response import Response
from rest_framework import status
from rest_framework.views import APIView

from notice.views import client as notice_client_views



[文档]class ListNoticeView(APIView):

[文档]    def get(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        """客户端分页获取所有消息"""
        son_resp: JsonResponse = notice_client_views.get_page_notice(
            receiver=f'{request.user.pk}-{request.company.pk}',
            page=int(request.query_params.get('page')),
            size=int(request.query_params.get('size')),
            title=request.query_params.get('title', '').strip(),
            company_type=request.company.company_type.name
        )
        if son_resp.status_code != status.HTTP_200_OK:
            return Response(status=son_resp.status_code, data=json.loads(son_resp.content))
        son_resp_json = json.loads(son_resp.content)
        resp = {
            'total': son_resp_json['total'],
            'current_page': son_resp_json['page'],
            'list': son_resp_json['items'],
            'page_range': list(range(1, son_resp_json['max_page']+1))
        }
        return Response(resp)




[文档]class RetrieveNoticeView(APIView):

[文档]    def get(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        """客户端获取某个消息详情"""
        son_resp: JsonResponse = notice_client_views.retrieve_notice(
            receiver=f'{request.user.pk}-{request.company.pk}',
            pk=kwargs.get('pk'),
            company_type=request.company.company_type.name
        )
        return Response(status=son_resp.status_code, data=json.loads(son_resp.content))




[文档]class NoticeStatusView(APIView):

[文档]    def get(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        """客户端分页获取所有消息"""
        son_resp: JsonResponse = notice_client_views.get_unread_status(
            receiver=f'{request.user.pk}-{request.company.pk}',
            company_type=request.company.company_type.name
        )
        if son_resp.status_code != status.HTTP_200_OK:
            return Response(status=son_resp.status_code, data=json.loads(son_resp.content))
        return Response(json.loads(son_resp.content))
